samples.question: How do most people travel in your country?
samples.transcript: For longer trips like across the country, most people go by train, but in my country, if you are just going to work, it might be by car or a bus. Now, I am going to give you a topic and I would like you to talk about it for 1 to two minutes. You have one minute to plan what you are going to say. You can make notes if you want to.

samples.question: Can I have the booklet, the paper, and the pencil?
samples.transcript: Thank you. you have been telling me about a person who is been a good friend to you. Now, I would like to ask some more general questions related to friendship.
samples.transcript_original: Thank you. You've been telling me about a person who's been a good friend to you. Now, I'd like to ask some more general questions related to friendship.
samples.transcript_cleaned: Thank you. you have been telling me about a person who is been a good friend to you. Now, I would like to ask some more general questions related to friendship.

samples.question: Where do people often meet new friends?
samples.transcript: First of all, I guess this could be anywhere from music venue to a sports club. it is fair to say that there are many more places to meet today than there were in the past. Another point is that you can meet others through mutual friends. So, you get introduced to friends of friends. We have to remember you can meet friends through your families like kids of parents' friends. this happens when you have social events like barbecues or birthdays. A similar way is through sporting teams. So a lot of people who play football together on the same team eventually becomes friends very close friends as they need to work well together to develop good teamwork skills.

So, you get introduced to friends of friends. We have to remember you can meet friends through your families like uh kids of parents' friends. Uh this happens when you have social events like barbecues or birthdays. A similar way is through sporting teams. So a lot of people who play football together on the same team eventually becomes friends very close friends as they need to work well together to develop good teamwork skills.

A similar way is through sporting teams. So a lot of people who play football together on the same team eventually becomes friends very close friends as they need to work well together to develop good teamwork skills.

samples.question: And do you think that our idea of friendship changes as we get older?
samples.transcript: It is hard to tell as I do not count myself as being old at the moment. So far, my idea of friendship has not changed that much. But when I was a small child, I think I had more friends. As children, we often have friendship with people who we do not have much in common with. that is less important to us. There are definitely some friendships that you grow out of as you do not see that much of each other and you move on. I do think the principle of friendship remains the same as you get older though.

There are definitely some friendships that you grow out of as you don't see that much of each other and you move on. I do think the principle of friendship remains the same as you get older though.

There are definitely some friendships that you grow out of as you do not see that much of each other and you move on. I do think the principle of friendship remains the same as you get older though.

samples.question: Why is friendship so important to human beings?
samples.transcript: Well, it is probably an evolutionary trait. If you have bonds, ties within a group, you are going to be stronger than just one person alone. If you are alone, you cannot share ideas. All these things help you to survive or did help people to survive with many thousands of years ago. In a modern day world, it is important nice to relax from everyday life. Friends are there to support you. We often have stressful lives today working hard and friends can be really helpful in listening to our problems and difficulties at work. We also need entertainment. And if we have a night out with friends, for example, going to cinema, it can be a fantastic way to forget about any problems we may be having.

samples.question: Do you think it is possible to live without friendship?
samples.transcript: It is definitely possible to live without friendship in life. However, in modern day world, while you could survive, I think your life would be a lot less pleasant and everyday things would be a lot harder without friends. However, it is also important to remember that ultimately we stand alone. What I mean is that nobody else can live my life. A person can give me advice, but in the end, I am responsible alone for my thoughts and actions.

samples.question: So, the question is, please, can you describe a skill you would like to learn?
samples.transcript: Okay, K, that is the end of your minute now. So, when you are ready, please start. There are many abilities that I really want to master. However, if I had to pick one, it would be photography because, you know, I am learning at Luong High School, which located in a thriving metropolis to city where every students at my school are really good at taking photos. And moreover, my school is famous for talented photography club names origin. So, that is the reason why I really want to learn a little bit about this skill. I am passionate about photography for a variety of reasons. Firstly, I am the person that really appreciate memories in my life. So whenever I gather with my beloved people, I really want to save everything in the pictures, especially our smile and our moment at that time. Secondly, I am really love traveling around the world. So I would like to capture all the breathtaking views everywhere I go. that is really fantastic you know it is passion. lastly the most realistic reason is I want to take photos for my sister and my brothers. I can vividly remember last summer we had a trip to Mandiffs, the most beautiful of the world and my sister wanted me to take photos for her and you know what I have help have her to took the ugliest photos of the year and of course it made her her blood boil and at that time when she yelled at me my heart sank but now when I have a little bit scoop of photography. I am much more confident. In the future, I will learn more about photography because that is my passion. Thank you so much. Well done, K. Excellent. Well done. Okay, we will now move on to part three now and we will continue about learning new skills. Okay, well done.

samples.question: Do you think learning new skills is important in today's world?
samples.transcript: Absolutely. Yes. Because you know the world is developing every day and we if we do not find out the way to improve ourself we will cannot keep up with each other and imagine that everyone is moving forward quickly and we just working slowly surfing the internet and do nothing. So I think it is vitally important to improve ourself by new knowledge in order to survive and growth in today's world. Thank you so much. Wow. What skills are important for young people today. I have a lots of idea about this question but I would like the most important skill for adolescent is time management because you know I found that my friends are really ambitious and they want to handle everything in their life from work earn money or learn new things a lot of things but you know the problem is they cannot manage their time so like they use their sleep sleep time just to earn more money like that and I start to have the question like is the cost of success is our mental and physical health. So I think in the future I will like make my plan more specifically in order to warn my health. Thank you. Well done. Wow.
